heading: HR01970
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS,IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION ON THE ILLEGAL ARREST OF AND THE FILING OF TRUMPED UP CHARGES AGAINST WOMEN'S RIGHTS ADVOCATE NERITA DE CASTRO UNDERSCORING THE ADVERSE IMPACT OF ILLEGAL ARRESTS ON THE IMPENDING RESUMPTION OF PEACE NEGOTIATIONS BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT OF THE PHILIPPINES (GRP) AND THE NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT OF THE PHILIPPINES (NDFP)
principal-authors: DE JESUS, EMMI A.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-07-30

FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS,IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION ON THE ILLEGAL ARREST OF AND THE FILING OF TRUMPED UP CHARGES AGAINST WOMEN'S RIGHTS ADVOCATE NERITA DE CASTRO UNDERSCORING THE ADVERSE IMPACT OF ILLEGAL ARRESTS ON THE IMPENDING RESUMPTION OF PEACE NEGOTIATIONS BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT OF THE PHILIPPINES (GRP) AND THE NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT OF THE PHILIPPINES (NDFP)
